body.name: OIIKI Screwdriver Replacement for Doorbell, Doorbell Screwdriver Replacement for Most Doorbells, Video Doorbell, WiFi Password Reset and Battery Change
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 13 hrs 26 mins
features: Application: Perfect to tear down doorbell for battery chang, charge & replacement as well as Wifi password reset access. Also used to take apart folding knives.

Fitted Doorbell: Universal screwdriver for All models of doorbell,including video doorbell,video doorbell 2, pro and elite. All in one, a must have screwdriver replacement if you lost your original one.
Material: The double-end bit is made of industrial grade quality S2 steel which is much more durable and harder. Precise and accurate to fit and remove your doorbell screws with no hassle and strip.
Features: Ergonomic grip for repeated use,convenient to hold in hand and rotate,durable for long time use. Light magnetic to hold small tiny screws.
After sales service: If you have anything concerned with doorbell screwdriver replacement after use, please first to choose contact us and we will take care of it for you.
